overview: Bimyana, a young Ayta girl, was over the moon when she found out that she got chosen to represent her school in a regional quiz bee. But as she prepares for the competition, she faced many challenges such as lack of school funding; a less enthusiastic response from her mother; and a powerful mythical creature that will test her courage and determination. Will she falter or will her inner warrior shine and conquer it all?
tagline: There's no force more powerful than a girl who dreams.
title: Bimyana
